A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Oh my... what an incredible disappointment on so many levels.  Been a fan since 1977.   I thought TFA was okay\, but now it seems that Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy are more concerned with promoting social justice and feminism than story\, plot and character development.  The 5 star reviews here must work for Disney.  Rogue One was a much better film.
